detail: The provided ZIP opened but individual entries returned a 'BadZipFile: Bad magic number for file header' when reading. This indicates archive corruption. I cannot compute a real compliance result from this file.
next_steps: Re-zip your repository from the folder root using a fresh archive.
Avoid nesting zip-inside-zip; ensure a single top-level folder ENERQIS_GlobalDB_TREEBUILD/.
macOS CLI: cd <parent> && zip -r ENERQIS_GlobalDB_TREEBUILD.zip ENERQIS_GlobalDB_TREEBUILD -x "*.DS_Store"
